siteHeader.title: Welcome to Crispy Div.
siteHeader.subtitle: I enjoy building websites using various technologies. Sometimes it's about technical specs. Sometimes it's about fun. I'd love to build your website.

header.title: I have these technologies in focus.
header.subtitle: I work with a variety of web technologies, each with its own strengths and use cases. Here are some of my recent favorites and demos of my implementations.

technologies.name: Astro
technologies.description: Astro is a modern static website generator that allows developers to build fast, content-focused websites. It supports multiple frameworks and optimizes for performance by shipping less JavaScript. Astro is perfect for informational websites with fairly static content.

technologies.name: React
technologies.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications. It allows developers to create reusable UI components and manage state efficiently. React is a Crispy Div favorite, in use for many projects to include this website.

technologies.name: PageMotor
technologies.description: PageMotor, a modular PHP framework built by Chris Pearson, is designed for rapid development of high-performance web pages. Built on OOP architecture, it enables reusable components, precise asset control, and content editing without reliance on page builders.

technologies.name: WordPress
technologies.description: WordPress is the legacy CMS powering much of the web. While it carries weight from years of plugins, patches, and page builders, it still holds its weight in content-driven workflows and client-friendly website management. It remains useful for rapid deployment.

header.title: What can Crispy Div do for you?
header.subtitle: Crispy Div isn't just a playground. It's a launchpad. If you need a fast, modern, and maintainable web presence, let's talk. Here's how I can help:

services.name: Custom Website Development
services.description: Tailored websites built with platforms like React, Astro, WordPress or your preference — fast, clean, responsive, and optimized.

services.name: Component Library Design
services.description: Need a reusable, themed UI system? I'll design a modular library to fit your team's stack and design.

services.name: CMS Conversions
services.description: Move from clunky builders to streamlined, modern frameworks — faster websites, easier maintenance.

services.name: Support and Maintenance
